description: ICS techniques used by Dragonfly, ATT&CK group G0035 (v4.0)
name: Dragonfly (G0035)

techniques.comment: [Dragonfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0035) utilized watering hole attacks on energy sector websites by injecting a redirect iframe to deliver [Backdoor.Oldrea](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0093) or [Trojan.Karagany](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0094). (Citation: Symantec Security Response July 2014)

[Dragonfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0035) trojanized legitimate ICS equipment providers software packages available for download on their websites.(Citation: Symantec Security Response July 2014)
